parameters.name: ApiFormat
parameters.description: The API.

parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The ID of the API.

parameters.name: ApiMethod
parameters.description:
The request method of the API. Valid values:

* **GET**
* **POST**
* **HEAD**
* **PUT**
* **DELETE**
* **CONNECT**
* **PATCH**
* **OPTIONS**

parameters.name: ApiStatus
parameters.description:
The API status. Valid values:

* **NewbornInterface**: The API is newly added.
* **OfflineInterface**: The API is inactive.
* **normal**: The API is normal.

parameters.name: ApiTag
parameters.description:
The business purpose of the API.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the business purposes of APIs.

parameters.name: ApiType
parameters.description:
The service object. Valid values:

* **PublicAPI**: public services
* **ThirdpartAPI**: cooperation with third-party partners
* **InternalAPI**: internal office

parameters.name: AuthFlag
parameters.description:
Specifies whether authentication is required. Valid values:

* **0**: Authentication is required.
* **1**: Authentication is not required.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

>  This parameter is available only in hybrid cloud scenarios. You can call the [DescribeHybridCloudClusters](~~2849376~~) operation to query hybrid cloud clusters.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp in UTC. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Follow
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to follow the API. Valid values:

* **1**: follows the API.
* **0**: does not follow the API.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: MatchedHost
parameters.description: The domain name or IP address of the API.

parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: The remarks.

parameters.name: OrderKey
parameters.description:
The name of the sorting field. Valid values:

* **allCnt**: the total number of calls to the API in the previous 30 days
* **botCnt**: the number of bot-initiated requests in the previous 30 days
* **crossBorderCnt**: the number of cross-border requests in the previous 30 days
* **abnormalNum**: the number of API-related risks
* **eventNum**: the number of API-related security events
* **farthestTs**: the time when the API was first detected
* **lastestTs**: the time of the most recent access to the API

parameters.name: OrderWay
parameters.description:
The sorting method. Valid values:

* **desc** (default): descending order
* **asc**: ascending order

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Value:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: RequestSensitiveType
parameters.description:
The sensitive data type in the request.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the supported sensitive data types.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: SensitiveLevel
parameters.description:
The sensitivity level of the API. Valid values:

* **L1**: high sensitivity
* **L2**: moderate sensitivity
* **L3**: low sensitivity
* **N**: non-sensitivity

parameters.name: SensitiveType
parameters.description:
The sensitive data type in the response.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the supported sensitive data types.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp in UTC. Unit: seconds.
